    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L3
    [int]                                   1         3
    [main]                                  5         8
    [(]                                     9         9
    [)]                                     10        10
L4
    [{]                                     1         1
L5
    [std]                                   4         6
    [::]                                    7         8
    [cout]                                  9         12
    [<<]                                    14        15
    ["Hello, "]                             17        25
L6
    ["world!\\n"]                           17        26
    [;]                                     27        27
L7
    [return]                                4         9
    [0]                                     11        11
    [;]                                     12        12
L8
    [}]                                     1         1
EOF
